mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adoption(adoptionNum, speciesSort, subject, num, nickName, content, imageFileName, status) VALUES(ADOPTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{speciesSort}, #{subject}, #{num}, #{nickName},#{content},#{imageFileName},1)
mapper.select:
SELECT adoptionNum,speciesSort,status,created,subject,hitCount,nickName,imageFileName FROM adoption
ORDER BY adoptionNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE adoption SET hitCount = hitCount+1 WHERE adoptionNum=#{adoptionNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT adoptionNum,subject FROM adoption
AND (adoptionNum > #{adoptionNum})
ORDER BY adoptionNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT adoptionNum,subject FROM adoption
AND (adoptionNum < #{adoptionNum})
ORDER BY adoptionNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE adoption SET speciesSort=#{speciesSort},subject=#{subject}, imageFileName=#{imageFileName}, content=#{content} WHERE adoptionNum=#{adoptionNum}
UPDATE adoption SET status=#{status} WHERE adoptionNum=#{adoptionNum} AND num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adoptionReply(adoptionReplyNum, content, parent, adoptionNum, num, nickName) VALUES(adoptionReply_seq.NEXTVAL,#{content},#{parent},#{adoptionNum},#{num},#{nickName})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(count(*),0) FROM adoptionReply WHERE adoptionNum=#{adoptionNum} AND parent=0

SELECT adoptionReplyNum, content, parent, adoptionNum, num, nickName, created FROM adoptionReply WHERE adoptionNum=#{adoptionNum} AND parent=0 ORDER BY adoptionReplyNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(count(*),0) FROM adoptionReply WHERE parent=#{parent}
SELECT adoptionReplyNum, content, parent, adoptionNum, num, nickName, created FROM adoptionReply WHERE parent=#{parent} ORDER BY adoptionReplyNum DESC
